item.title: 6 of the biggest challenges facing Musk’s new political party
item.description: The richest man in the world says he has started “the America Party.” Turning it into a meaningful movement will be difficult.

item.title: One of the Supreme Court’s sharpest critics sits on it
item.description: Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson emerges as a strong voice on an unusually fractious U.S. Supreme Court.

item.title: Democrats step up efforts to woo military veterans ahead of midterms
item.description: The Democratic Party is pushing to field more veterans as candidates in hopes of appealing to skeptical voters.
